column2: an announcement came over the loudspeaker. “All those involved in the Cartwright case
column3: please make their way back in to court number four
column4: as the jury is returning.”|A Prisoner of Birth|Jeffrey Archer

column1: 15:12|Perhaps those three miles were nearer four
column6: he described the tower of the Congregational church above the leafless elms and maples of the village
column7: the gilded hands pointed to twelve minutes past three.|The Turner Twins|Ralph Henry Barbour
